name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Returns
overview: Nobunaga no Yabou Returns is a remake of the original Nobunaga's Ambition from 1983. The strategy gameplay is identical to the original release — select either Oda Nobunaga or Takeda Shingen and attempt to conquer the 17 regions of Kansai and central Japan — but this remake features completely redone graphics and sound. All daimyo are now rendered in full 3D, and there is a full remixed soundtrack including many songs appearing from other Nobunaga's Ambition games.
